title: Can't create several services with the same name with Native SACM
content:
You can't connect a new Service Management tenant with an existing UCMDB Gateway installation.

Cause

In the standard SMA SACM module, it's possible to create several services with the same name. This is no longer possible with the Native SACM solution since the reconciliation engine in UD/UCMDB prevents creating several services with the same name. 

Workaround

In case it's required to create several services with the same name, we recommend that you deactivate the identification rule (change it to "No identification") for the Business and Infrastructure Service CI types in UCMDB.
